column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I went during a weekday and it was STILL packed. For good reasons
column2: it really IS the museum of the States. They carry a big array of different collections and eras. You think you're finished
column3: but look around the corner and it opens up an entire new section. It was pretty frustrating having to figure out which direction to go to make the least effort. However
column4: there's art everywhere and that was the fun part.
